experiment.name: Transcription profiling by array of Arabidopsis overexpressing rice topoisomerase 6 genes

description.text: 10-day-old wild-type and homozygous transgenic Arabidopsis seedlings (overexpressing OsTOP6A3 and OsTOP6B) grown under normal growth conditions were used for total RNA isolation. The 5 micrograms of each total RNA sample was processed for microarray analysis according to Affymetrix protocol.  Experiment Overall Design: The experiment involves the study of differential gene expression in transgenic Arabidopsis seedlings overexpressing rice topoisomerase 6 subunit A (OsTOP6A3) and subunit B (OsTOP6B) cDNAs as compared to wild-type.Two biological replicates for each sample were used for microarray analysis.

bibliography.authors: Mukesh Jain, Akhilesh K Tyagi, Jitendra P Khurana
bibliography.title: Overexpression of putative topoisomerase 6 genes from rice confers stress tolerance in transgenic Arabidopsis plants.
